version_description:
App Updates:
 
Our Anniversary Sale will run from August 17th to 31th, featuring this year’s lowest priced deals!
 
We will revamp the homepage and add a flash deals feature to simplify finding discounted products.
 
Anniversary Sale Timeline:
 
Aug 15th to 24th
-          New Buyers $166 Coupon Gift Pack
-          Lucky Draw Game, Win Up to $200 Coupons!
 
Aug 17th to 31th
-          App-Only High Discount Deals
 
Aug 24th to 31th
-          Mobile Goal Week – Reach Your Buying goals and Win Coupons
-          App-Only Lucky Draw Game – Win Up to $150 Coupons!

Nov 9 to Nov 12
11.11 - Sale Of The Year

Spend Less, Get More

TRIPLE Your Savings With:
· 90% Off Discounts
· 50% Off Seller Coupons
· 10% Off Coupons

App Updates
1. We’re launching two new promotions with the 11.11 sale (Multi-Tiered Discounts, Bonus Coupons)
2. Updated the accuracy of the image search function.

App Updates:
1. We’ve made some general improvements to the App, for a more rewarding user experience.

1. Additional currencies can now be used when paying for orders.
2. On every item page there is now a “Similar Items” section, recommending similar products you may be interested in.
3. We have improved translations for non-English versions of the app.

App Updates：
1. Added a new feature, “Best Selling Products”, to help buyers discover the best-selling products within the most recent 24 hours.
2. Added support for DHPay payment method.
3. Made performance optimizations to the home page.
4. Fixed bugs.

Dispute's Message History

App Updates:
1. The speed of the ’Find Similar’ function has been improved.
2. You can now check your ‘Refund & Dispute’ messages from the Dispute Resolution Center on the My Orders page.
3. Using IM, you can now send order numbers directly to sellers with the touch of a button.

App Updates:
1. Our ‘Social Savings’ function is now available on our app! Share your purchases with your friends and enjoy lower prices together.
2. To make buying easier, short videos have been added that showcase details about products.
3. According to Australian law, a Goods and Service Tax has been added for those with an Australian shipping address and without an Australian business number (ABN).

App Updates:

Our ‘DHrefer’ program is an exciting new marketing tool provided by DHgate to sellers.
--Sellers are able to set the amount of money back that buyers will receive by sharing products.
--If the shared link is used to purchase, it is a win-win in savings for both!
